attributes.action: Pay parents more money who claim child tax benefits
attributes.additional_details: There is parents who struggle with money, meaning they can't give their children the best, so this will benefit a lot of parents. We must make sure we all have enough money to look after our families first before giving millions to other countries.
attributes.background: In total, the government has given millions of pounds to other countries. We should slightly reduce the amount of money we give to them, and pay more to parents in the UK to help them support their children better.
